mapper.select: SELECT PAT_CODE , PAT_NAME , PAT_TEL , PAT_IHIDNUM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PAT_BRTHDY),'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAT_BRTHDY, (SELECT C1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P1, TB_COMMON_CODE C1 WHERE P1.PAT_GEN_CODE = C1.COM_CODE AND P1.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND') AS PAT_GEN_CODE , PAT_ADDR , PAT_DTL_ADDR, PAT_ZIP , to_char(PAT_FIRST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_FIRST_DATE, to_char(PAT_LAST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_LAST_DATE , PAT_HSPTLZ_OUT_PLAN, (SELECT C3.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P3, TB_COMMON_CODE C3 WHERE P3.PAT_FRGNR_YN = C3.COM_CODE AND P3.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C3.COM_CODE_GRP = 'YSNO') AS PAT_FRGNR_YN , (SELECT C2.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P2, TB_COMMON_CODE C2 WHERE P2.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = C2.COM_CODE AND P2.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C2.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT') AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS FROM TB_PATIENT WHERE PAT_CODE = #{patCode}

SELECT A.PAT_CODE , A.PAT_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PAT_BRTHDY),'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAT_BRTHDY, (SELECT C1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P1 INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C1 ON P1.PAT_GEN_CODE = C1.COM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R1 ON P1.PAT_CODE = R1.PAT_CODE WHERE R1.RCEPT_NO = #{rceptNo} AND C1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND') AS PAT_GEN_CODE, (SELECT C2.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P2 INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C2 ON P2.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = C2.COM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R2 ON P2.PAT_CODE = R2.PAT_CODE WHERE R2.RCEPT_NO = #{rceptNo} AND C2.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT') AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS, (SELECT C3.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_RECEIPT R3 INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C3 ON R3.RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE = C3.COM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT P3 ON R3.PAT_CODE = P3.PAT_CODE WHERE R3.RCEPT_NO = #{rceptNo} AND C3.COM_CODE_GRP = 'FEXM') AS RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE, (SELECT C4.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_RECEIPT R4 INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C4 ON R4.RCEPT_DAY_CODE = C4.COM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT P4 ON R4.PAT_CODE = P4.PAT_CODE WHERE R4.RCEPT_NO = #{rceptNo} AND C4.COM_CODE_GRP = 'DAYN') AS RCEPT_DAY_CODE, B.RCEPT_NO , to_char(B.RECEPT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RECEPT_TIME, B.RCEPT_MEMO FROM TB_PATIENT A INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT B ON A.PAT_CODE = B.PAT_CODE WHERE B.RCEPT_NO= #{rceptNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.DETAIL_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DETAIL_REG_DATE, A.TREAT_NO FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL A INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC B ON B.TREAT_NO = A.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT C ON C.RCEPT_NO = B.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT D ON D.PAT_CODE = C.PAT_CODE WHERE D.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND B.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE NOT IN ('FAIL', 'CING')

SELECT c.treat_no as treat_no , c.clnic_sttus_code as clnic_sttus_code , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.pat_brthdy),'YYYY-MM-DD') as pat_brthdy , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , c6.com_code_name as pat_hsptlz_status , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name , r.recept_time FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c6 ON p.pat_hsptlz_status = c6.com_code AND c6.com_code_grp = 'HSPT' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' WHERE cs.emp_no=#{empNo} AND c.clnic_sttus_code IN ('INWT','IEND','IING','WAIT','CING','PHWT') ORDER BY r.rcept_no

SELECT c.treat_no as treat_no , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , p.pat_hsptlz_status , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.pat_brthdy),'YYYY-MM-DD') as pat_brthdy , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name , r.recept_time FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' WHERE c.clnic_sttus_code != 'FAIL' ORDER BY c.treat_no
mapper.update: update TB_CLINIC set CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'CING' where TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'WAIT'
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DETAIL_REG_DATE, (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'FEXM' AND R.RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE = CC1.COM_CODE) AS RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE, (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'DAYN' AND R.RCEPT_DAY_CODE = CC1.COM_CODE) AS RCEPT_DAY_CODE, (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT' AND P.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = CC1.COM_CODE) AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS, CD.DETAIL_MEMO, D.DISS_CODE_NO, D.DISS_ENG_NAME, D.DISS_KOR_NAME, T.TRE_CONTENT, P.PHYSIO_CONTENT, I.INSPC_TYPE, MIL.MEDI_ITEM_NAME, RT.RCIV_PAYMENT FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON CD.TREAT_NO = C.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON C.RCEPT_NO = R.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT P ON R.PAT_CODE = P.PAT_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_RECEIPTION RT ON C.TREAT_NO = RT.TREAT_NO LEFT JOIN TB_DISEASE D ON CD.DISS_CODE_NO = D.DISS_CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TB_TREATMENT_LIST TL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = TL.DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_TREATMENT T ON TL.TRE_CODE = T.TRE_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST PL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = PL.DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY P ON PL.PHYSIO_CODE = P.PHYSIO_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = IL.DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_INSPECTION I ON IL.INSPC_CODE = I.INSPC_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTION PR ON CD.DETAIL_NO = PR.DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_MEDI_ITEM_LIST MIL ON PR.MEDI_ITEM_CODE = MIL.MEDI_ITEM_CODE WHERE TO_CHAR(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE #{detailRegDate}||'%' AND P.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE != 'FAIL'

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM') || '06' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL((SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DETAIL_NO,-3))) FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_NO LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM')||'%'),0)+1, '000')) AS DETAIL_NO FROM dual
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CHART_DETAIL ( DETAIL_NO, DISS_CODE_NO, TREAT_NO, DETAIL_REG_DATE, P_DETAIL_NO, DETAIL_MEMO ) values(#{detailNo},null,#{treatNo},SYSDATE,null,null)
mapper.select: SELECT INSPC_CODE, INSPC_COST, INSPC_TYPE FROM tb_inspection

SELECT INSPC_CODE, INSPC_COST, INSPC_TYPE FROM tb_inspection WHERE INSPC_TYPE LIKE '%'|| #{searchInspc} ||'%' OR INSPC_COST LIKE '%'|| #{searchInspc} ||'%' OR INSPC_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{searchInspc} ||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into tb_inspection_list ( DETAIL_NO, INSPC_CODE, INSPC_STATUS, EMP_NO, INSPC_COST, INSPC_MEMO, COM_FILE_CODE, INSPC_DATE ) values(#{detailNo},#{inspcCode},'STBY',null,#{inspcCost},#{inspcMemo},null,sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CLINIC CL SET CL.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'INWT' WHERE CL.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = IL.DETAIL_NO WHERE CD.TREAT_NO = CL.TREAT_NO )
mapper.select: SELECT IL.DETAIL_NO, IL.INSPC_CODE, IL.INSPC_MEMO, I.INSPC_TYPE FROM TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION I ON I.INSPC_CODE = IL.INSPC_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON IL.DETAIL_NO = CD.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON C.TREAT_NO = CD.TREAT_NO WHERE IL.DETAIL_NO = #{detailNo}
SELECT CD.TREAT_NO, CD.DETAIL_NO, R.PAT_CODE FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON C.TREAT_NO = CD.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON C.RCEPT_NO = R.RCEPT_NO WHERE R.RCEPT_NO=#{rceptNo}

SELECT IL.DETAIL_NO, IL.INSPC_CODE, IL.INSPC_MEMO, AF.FILE_CODE, AF.FILE_NAME, AF.FILE_PHYSIC_PATH, AF.FILE_WEB_PATH, I.INSPC_TYPE FROM TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION I ON I.INSPC_CODE = IL.INSPC_CODE INNER JOIN TB_ATTACH_FILE AF ON AF.FILE_CODE = IL.DETAIL_NO || IL.INSPC_CODE WHERE AF.FILE_CODE = #{detailNo} || #{inspcCode}
SELECT TRE_CODE, TRE_COSTS, TRE_CONTENT FROM TB_TREATMENT
SELECT TRE_CODE, TRE_COSTS, TRE_CONTENT FROM TB_TREATMENT WHERE TRE_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchTreat} ||'%' OR TRE_COSTS LIKE '%'|| #{searchTreat} ||'%' OR TRE_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{searchTreat} ||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into TB_TREATMENT_LIST ( DETAIL_NO, TRE_CODE, TRE_STATUS, EMP_NO, TRE_DATE, TRE_COSTS, TRE_MEMO ) values ( #{detailNo}, #{treCode}, 'STBY', null, sysdate, #{treCosts}, #{treMemo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CLINIC CL SET CL.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'PHWT' WHERE CL.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD INNER JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST PL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = PL.DETAIL_NO WHERE CD.TREAT_NO = CL.TREAT_NO )
mapper.select: SELECT PHYSIO_CODE, PHYSIO_COST, PHYSIO_CONTENT FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY

SELECT PHYSIO_CODE, PHYSIO_COST, PHYSIO_CONTENT FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY WHERE PHYSIO_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchPhysio} ||'%' OR PHYSIO_COST LIKE '%'|| #{searchPhysio} ||'%' OR PHYSIO_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{searchPhysio} ||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST ( DETAIL_NO, PHYSIO_CODE, PHYSIO_STATUS, EMP_NO, PHYSIO_COST, PHYSO_DATE ) values ( #{detailNo}, #{physioCode}, 'STBY', null, #{physioCost}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT DISS_CODE_NO, DISS_ENG_NAME, DISS_KOR_NAME FROM TB_DISEASE

SELECT DISS_CODE_NO, DISS_ENG_NAME, DISS_KOR_NAME FROM TB_DISEASE WHERE DISS_KOR_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchDiss} ||'%' OR DISS_ENG_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchDiss} ||'%' OR DISS_CODE_NO LIKE '%'|| #{searchDiss} ||'%'

SELECT M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE, M.MEDI_ITEM_NAME, M.MEDI_ITEM_MAKR, M.MEDI_ITEM_UNIT, C.COM_CODE_NAME AS NARCOTIC_YN, M.MEDI_ITEM_USAGE, M.MEDI_ITEM_PRICE FROM TB_MEDI_ITEM_LIST M LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C ON M.NARCOTIC_YN = C.COM_CODE AND C.COM_CODE_GRP = 'YSNO'

SELECT M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE, M.MEDI_ITEM_NAME, M.MEDI_ITEM_MAKR, M.MEDI_ITEM_UNIT, C.COM_CODE_NAME AS NARCOTIC_YN, M.MEDI_ITEM_USAGE, M.MEDI_ITEM_PRICE FROM TB_MEDI_ITEM_LIST M LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C ON M.NARCOTIC_YN = C.COM_CODE AND C.COM_CODE_GRP = 'YSNO' WHERE M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{searchMedi} ||'%' OR M.MEDI_ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchMedi} ||'%' OR M.MEDI_ITEM_MAKR LIKE '%'|| #{searchMedi} ||'%' OR M.MEDI_ITEM_USAGE LIKE '%'|| #{searchMedi} ||'%' OR M.MEDI_ITEM_PRICE LIKE '%'|| #{searchMedi} ||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PRESCRIPTION ( DETAIL_NO, MEDI_ITEM_CODE, PRSCRPTN_AMOUNT, PRSCRPTN_COUNT, PRSCRPTN_STATUS, PRSCRPTN_DAYS, MEDI_ITEM_PRICE, EMP_NO ) values ( #{detailNo}, #{mediItemCode}, #{prscrptnAmount}, #{prscrptnCount}, 'STBY', #{prscrptnDays}, #{mediItemPrice}, null )
mapper.select: select ORDR_COST, ORDR_CONTENT, ORDR_CODE, DISS_CODE_NO, GRP_ORDR_NM, GRP_ORDR_NO, (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'ORDR' AND ORDR_CLASS = CC1.COM_CODE) AS ORDR_CLASS from TB_GRP_ORDR where DISS_CODE_NO=#{dissCodeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_HOSPITALIZATION ( HSPTLZ_NO, PAT_CODE, TREAT_NO ) values ( (SELECT 'H' || TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(HSPTLZ_NO), 2)) + 1, 'FM0000')FROM TB_HOSPITALIZATION), #{patCode}, #{treatNo} )
mapper.select: /*cntEmptBed*/ select count(SCK_BD_CONDITION) from tb_sickbed where SCK_BD_CONDITION = 'EMPT'
